prompts: Build a clothing e-commerce website backend.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development.
Current step: Choose Web Development.
Options: Frontend, Backend, Deployment & Hosting.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Frontend.
Current step: Choose Frontend.
Options: Client-Side Rendering (CSR), Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Progressive Web App (PWA), Static Site Generation (SSG), WebAssembly (Wasm), Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR), Cross Platform Frontend Languages, Transpiled-to-JavaScript Languages.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend.
Current step: Choose Backend.
Options: REST, GraphQL, gRPC, WebSockets, Server-Sent Events (SSE), WebRTC.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + REST.
Current step: Choose REST.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, PHP, Go, C#, Ruby, Rust, Elixir, Kotlin, Scala, Dart, Haskell, Crystal, Lua, R, C/C++.

Build a clothing e-commerce website backend. using Web Development + Backend + GraphQL.
Current step: Choose GraphQL.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, Kotlin, Scala, Ruby, Go.
